Text: As far as I know this game isn`t even out yet, and if it even was out. It sucks.. It`s like a shitty clone of Blitzkrieg 2..   Trust me, if you played Blitzkrieg series and all that. Fields of Thunder offers absolutely nothing new.. I tried the Demo..   It doesn`t even have airstrike :P
where i can find a crack to this game? does it need one?
